catppuccin@@default-font: "Cascadia Code PL", "Vollkorn", "Gentium Book Basic", -apple-system, blinkmacsystemfont, "Segoe UI", "Microsoft YaHei Light", sans-serif
catppuccin@@not-editor: "Cascadia Code PL", "Public Sans", "Gill Sans", -apple-system, system-ui, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", Arial, sans-serif
catppuccin@@mermaid-font: "Cascadia Code PL", "Inter", -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", Roboto, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "Apple Color Emoji", "Segoe UI Emoji", "Segoe UI Symbol", "Microsoft YaHei Light", sans-serif
catppuccin@@font-monospace: "Cascadia Code Mono PL", "Mononoki Nerd Font Mono", sfmono-regular, consolas, "Roboto Mono", monospace
